title: icobits
author: icobits
content: THE Protocol | Vitalik Suggest | Vitalik RecommendsTHE Website | THE Twitter |  THE Telegram Channel |THE Telegram Group  | THE Bounty Spreadsheets Bounty Schedule (5 Weeks)WEEK 1 OCTOBER 19 - OCTOBER 25 WEEK 2 OCTOBER 26 - NOVEMBER 1 WEEK 3 NOVEMBER 2 - NOVEMBER 8 WEEK 4 NOVEMBER 9 - NOVEMBER 15 WEEK 5 NOVEMBER 16 - NOVEMBER 22 Bounty AllocationTwitter 30% | Facebook 20% | Reddit 20% | Youtube 10% | Article 10% | Telegram 10%Total Allocation for this bounty: $25,000 Worth of $THE TokensDistributions: 50% 1 Month after the bounty ends | 50% 2 Months after the bounty endsGeneral Rules1. Spamming will not be tolerated2. 1 Day Bounty job will receive zero stakes and will be remove from the campaign3. Cheating | Plagiarism will be remove from the campaign4. Multi accounts is not allowed5. Negative users are not allowed6. Bitcointalk account with less than 90 Activity points will receive ZERO stakesMust post proof of authentication postQuoteUsername:Bitcointalk profile name:BSC Address:Bounty Joined:General Requirements1. Follow THE official twitter account: https://twitter.com/_THE_PROTOCOL2. Follow THE official telegram channel: https://t.me/THE_TGCHANNEL3. Join THE official telegram group: https://t.me/THE_TGGROUP4. Must join official bounty group: https://t.me/THEBOUNTYGROUP5. Bounty reports should be made in the bounty threadBounty Reporting Guide Code:Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link:Proof of Authentication post:Telegram Username:BSC Address:WEEK #Twitter:Twitter Username:Twitter Profile Link:# of Followers:Retweet #1Retweet #2Retweet #3Retweet #4Retweet #5Own Tweet #1Own Tweet #2RedditReddit Post #1Reddit Post #2Reddit Post #3Reddit Post #4Reddit Post #5YoutubeYoutube Channel: # of Subs:Video #1Video #2ArticleArticle Link #1Article Link #2TelegramTelegram Username:Requirements1. Must have atleast 300 Followers2. Account must be Crypto Related3. Must Tag @_THE_PROTOCOL on all tweet and retweet4. Must us Hashtags #THE #THEProtocol #Airdrop #Presale5. Must RT 5x Weekly6. Must Create 2x own tweet and tag @_THE_PROTOCOL7. SPAM Retweet or Retweeting everything in 1 day will receive ZERO STAKESStakes:300 - 3000 Followers: 1 stake3001 - 6000 Followers : 2 Stakes6001 and up Followers: 3 StakesJoin Here: https://forms.gle/QgfuJAyzWDAdaZZu8Requirements1. Must have atleast 30 Post/Comment Karma2. Must post in crypto related sub reddit group3. Must include website link https://theprotocol.network on all reddit post4. Must post 5x weekly5. All post must be related to the project, Posting non-sense spammy post will receive zero stakesStakes: 1 stake per postJoin Here: https://forms.gle/cfyt6zTmejxUXj4G9Requirements1. Must have atleast 100 Subs2. Channel must be crypto related3. Video must be related to the project.4. Must include website link, twitter and telegram links on the descriptions5. Add your bitcointalk username on the descriptions6. Videos must reach atleast 100 views to receive stakes7. Videos must be 2:00 minutes long8. Each participants can create max of 2 videos per weekStakes: Upto 100 stakes depending on quality, views, engagements, likes, commentsJoin Here: https://forms.gle/PpMGcqpLJZrHWJWt8Requirements1. Article should be written on MEDIUM, STEEMIT and own website2. Blogspot articles will receive ZERO stakes3. Must have atleast 500 words4. Must use pictures and images from the website5. Copy pasting will receive zero stakes6. Must include website link, twitter and telegram links8. Each participants can create max of 2 articles per weekStakes: upto 100 stakes depending on quality, engagements, views, clapsJoin Here: https://forms.gle/v3E7MgUwYdnLBkaR8Requirements1. User must join our official channel: https://t.me/THE_TGCHANNEL2. User must join our official group: https://t.me/THE_TGGROUP3. Telegram Activity is optional. 4. Most active telegram user will receive USDT rewards after bounty ends5. Spammers will be remove from the group and campaignStakes: 10 StakesBonus: Upto 100 stakes for good telegram engagementsJoin Here: https://forms.gle/kGg3wQGbmvdMhaTX8Disclaimer: I ICOBits will solely manage this campaign, Any question or project related inquiries - Asked in the official group. I will only manage this campaign, distributions will be handled by the project owner
